Package com.ilm.projecto_ilm_backend.dao

Class UserTaskDao

java.lang.Object
com.ilm.projecto_ilm_backend.dao.AbstractDao<UserTaskEntity>
com.ilm.projecto_ilm_backend.dao.UserTaskDao
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class UserTaskDao extends AbstractDao<UserTaskEntity>
DAO class for UserTaskEntity operations. This class handles database operations related to user tasks, such as persisting, merging, and querying user tasks.
See Also:
